product.title: Full Moon Beautiful Blossoming Purple Peony Flowers Building Blocks
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Celebrate the full moon and imperial flower 

    Display this stunning Imperial Peony flower in your house as a symbol of honor, beauty, romance, and wealth - usually given as a gift to congratulate someone for accomplishing something meaningful like graduating.

    This flower set can be also used to express the beauty and uniqueness of a woman, so it is a wonderful and thoughtful gift for showing someone special in your life how beautiful you think she is.

    🌑 Measurements: 27.5 x 22.5 x 24cm / 12 x 9 x 10in
    🌑 Compatible with leading blocks of standard size (16mm)
    🌑 Single set has over 1160 pieces
    🌑 Excludes original box to protect the environment. For further details please see below.* 


    Designed with passion for sakura lovers to enjoy

    If you are a big fan of Japanese Sakura who loves the pandemonium of pink petals, this is a must-have in your room. It also has a high-quality LED with a switch to illuminate your magnificent Sakura onto your wall and ceiling. Our Romantic Japanese Sakura Cherry Blossom Tree Set is made with exquisite details as shown. 


    Built especially for adults

    Our building blocks are designed with advanced engineering features providing a unique building experience for all building block fans. We always provide an easy-to-follow instruction booklet for you to build your perfect Japanese Cherry Blossom Tree with no hassle.

    The perfect gift for those who love their crafts!

    You will love seeing your family and friends in excitement when they receive our building blocks, leaving an everlasting smile on your loved ones by surprising them with these super innovative and cool building blocks today.

    Features

    🌸 100% premium quality (ABS) plastic
    🌸 Sharp brilliant colors and solid feel
    🌸 Challenging and rewarding to stimulate all brains
    🌸 High-quality durable non-toxic green material

    * Our Building Block sets are packaged in safe and secured protective bags. They do NOT come in the original box to reduce the carbon footprint, save the planet and reduce postage cost on your behalf. It will come with all the pieces and a detailed instruction booklet for you to follow along. If there are missing building blocks please contact us via email at info@kawaiies.com with images of the missing pieces from the booklet.

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contain small parts; not suitable for children under 6 years old unless there is adult supervision.

     

  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and are proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the blocks made from?     All our building blocks are manufactured from a High-Quality Premium strong, resilient plastic known as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and will stand the test of time and provide hours of fun building their own creations

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our building blocks are a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations. As children comment on their building creations, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

    Are these compatible with other leading brands? Yes, these are traditional/standard-sized blocks so they are compatible with leading blocks. 

    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 6 years old

     

  • We are proud to offer FREE tracked shipping to over 300 countries worldwide including the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many others. If you are wondering if we ship to your country please head over to our Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
